title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and Python/JS libraries to pull, run, and manage GGML/GGUF models locally with a built-in model registry.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official TypeScript/JavaScript client for the Ollama HTTP API, published on npm as ‘ollama’.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK on PyPI; chat, generate, embed, pull, push models with a few lines of code.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package letting you use Ollama models as LLMs, chat, or embeddings inside LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (Ollama-WebUI)
summary: Feature-rich web interface (chat UI, multi-user, RAG, plugins) that talks to a local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-cli (node-ollama-cli)
summary: Community npm CLI that wraps the Ollama REST API with prompts, history, and markdown rendering.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama; offers synchronous & async APIs and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem wrapping the Ollama API; chat, generate, embed, list models with idiomatic Ruby.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement inside the editor.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that answers users via an Ollama backend; supports slash commands and threads.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU and PVC support.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a service in CI pipelines for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by the community; use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET library (NuGet) providing strongly-typed client, streaming chat, and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-rag-stack
summary: Template repo showing how to build a private RAG system with Ollama, Chroma, and LangChain in Docker Compose.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Lightweight Slack bot (Go) that proxies Slack mentions to an Ollama instance and posts back responses.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Official n8n node enabling no-code workflows to query any local Ollama model via drag-and-drop.

title: ollama-ui-streamlit
summary: Minimal Streamlit chat UI that connects to Ollama; supports markdown, code highlighting, and session memory.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds a side-panel chat powered by any Ollama model for brainstorming inside your vault.

title: ollama-llamaindex
summary: LlamaIndex LLM and embedding drivers for Ollama; enables local RAG with LlamaIndex pipelines.
